events.name: 2nd Singapore Cloud Foundry meetup
events.description: Thanks for a great first meetup, the next Singapore Cloud Foundry Meetup will be on 9th July 2015 @Paypal (5 Temasek Blvd #07-01 Suntec Tower Five, Singapore[masked]). We are going to start later with this meetup at 7pm for beer/pizza based on the feedback we got last time. Program : • 7.00PM : Beer & Pizzas • 7.30PM : Talks • Securing Cloud Native Apps. Will Tran, Agile Engineer, Pivotal. He is one of Cloud Foundry committers, aka "Lead Java guy" on API gateway for Pivotal Cloud Foundry. He will talk about API Gateway and Securing app to app communication with the multi-tenancy features of UAA, cover OAuth2 and Open ID Connect. • Cloud Foundry CLI. Justin WW Lee, Cloud Technical Evangelist, IBM He will share how to set up an instance on Bluemix quickly and use CF CLI to directly push your application into ‎Bluemix. Note the change in the address to PayPal office LEVEL 7 Hope to see you there!
events.location: Paypal at Suntec , 5 Temasek Blvd, #07-01 Suntec Tower Five, Nearest Mrt:Promenade(Yellow Line), Singapore

events.name: ArtScience Late
events.description: One Thursday a month, 7pm to 10pm 2015:time:space: By Robert Casteels, Dirk Stromberg and Andrew Thomas 7.30pm and 9pm Expression Gallery, Level 4 2015:time:space: is a collaborative work of voices, electronic instruments, live processing, tape and video. New electronic instruments are altered in real time, fusing effortlessly with the human voice. Projected against this kaleidoscope of sound will be stunning pre-recorded images of Singapore, tying in sounds from humanity to the technology of our modern world, crossing time and space. Original production generously supported by the National Arts Council. Entry is complimentary and on a first come first served basis.

events.name: Security in Azure
events.description: Hi All, We will be having a meetup on Azure related security. Here is the main agenda; • How do I encrypt Azure SQL Database (Database Encryption, backup and restore). • Where do I save my encryption keys or certificates in Azure. An introduction to Azure Key Vault using HSM (Hardware Security Module). Do you know that Azure has this service? • And some other cool security related stuff in Azure. Please join this meetup and there will be light food (Pizzas and Drinks) as usual. Many thanks and see you there.
events.location: 22CF12, Level 22, Microsoft Singapore, Singapore 018989, One Marina Boulevard
